title: In Liberia, Ebola Makes 'Pariahs' Out Of The Sick, Says NYT Reporter
teaser: Helene Cooper grew up in Liberia and still has family there. Reporting on the disease last month, she says when she saw a sick, little boy get out of an ambulance, she "completely lost it."
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
